org.ninit.models.bm25
Class BM25BooleanQuery

java.lang.Object
  Query
      org.ninit.models.bm25.BM25BooleanQuery

public class BM25BooleanQuery
extends Query

Query based in BM25 family ranking functions.
WARNING:Searcher similarity will be ignored, in order to calculate the relevance BM25Similarity or BM25FSimilarity are used.
WARNING:BM25Parameters.setAverageLength or BM25FParameters.setAverageLength must be invoked in order to set the average length for the field(s).

Author:
"Joaquin Perez-Iglesias"
See Also:
BM25Parameters, BM25FParameters

BM25BooleanQuery

public BM25BooleanQuery(java.lang.String query,
                        java.lang.String field,
                        Analyzer analyzer)
                 throws ParseException,
                        java.io.IOException
Build a query that will use BM25 function ranking in the field passed as parameter.
WARNING:BM25Parameters.setAverageLength must be invoked in order to set the average length for the field 'field'.

Parameters:
query - The query String
field - The field to search
analyzer - Analyzer used to parse the query String
Throws:
ParseException
java.io.IOException
See Also:
BM25Parameters

BM25BooleanQuery

public BM25BooleanQuery(java.lang.String query,
                        java.lang.String[] fields,
                        Analyzer analyzer)
                 throws ParseException,
                        java.io.IOException
Build a query that will use BM25F function ranking. By default a boost factor equals to 1 for each field will be applied. The length normalization parameter for each field b_field will be set up to 0.75.
WARNING:BM25FParameters.setAverageLength must be invoked in order to set the average length for each field in 'fields'.

Parameters:
query - The query String
fields - The fields to search
analyzer - Analyzer used to parse the query String
Throws:
ParseException
java.io.IOException
See Also:
BM25FParameters

BM25BooleanQuery

public BM25BooleanQuery(java.lang.String query,
                        java.lang.String[] fields,
                        Analyzer analyzer,
                        float[] boosts,
                        float[] bParams)
                 throws ParseException,
                        java.io.IOException
Build a query that will use BM25F function ranking.
WARNING:BM25FParameters.setAverageLength must be invoked in order to set the average length for each field in 'fields'.

Parameters:
query - The query String
fields - The fields to search
analyzer - Analyzer used to parse the query String
boosts - The boost factor applied to the fields array
bParams - The length normalization factors applied to the fields array
Throws:
ParseException
java.io.IOException
See Also:
BM25FParameters
